name: 運動專長術科：網球
restrict: 允許重複修 ◎課程開放上修
goals: To enhance the knowledge and application of tennis skills and tactics.
Understand the basic knowledge of tennis rules and historical development of tennis.
Take part in tennis and enjoy the fun and development it provides
Learn the characteristics of tennis and utilize related disciplines to practice singles and doubles
Challenge Tennis International Professional Tournament and Challenge Tennis Domestic Tennis Ranking Tournament
syllabus:
**Class Schedule****（****tentative, 16+2 Flexible course****）****:**

**W1 Practice singles and doubles matches**

**W2 National Tennis Ranking Tournament**

**W3 Tennis Technical Training**

**W4 Tennis Technical Training**

**W5 Practice singles and doubles matches**

**W6 Practice singles and doubles matches**

**W7 National Tennis Ranking Tournament**

**W8 Tennis Technical Training**

**W9 Practice singles and doubles matches**

**W10 Practice singles and doubles matches**

**W11 National College Tennis Ranking Tournament**

**W12 National Intercollegiate Athletic Game 2022**

**W13 National Intercollegiate Athletic Game 2022**

**W14 Foundation training**

**W15 Foundation training**

**W16 Foundation training**

**W17 Adjust according to the actual situation**

**W18 Adjust according to the actual situation**

methodologies.note: They talk each other after every practice matches
Inschool and out of school practice games.

grading.note: National Tennis Ranking Tournament and National College Tennis Ranking Tournament
No more than six requests for leave in a semester, if more than six times, the teacher may not give points according to the situation.

prerequisite: The course can be retaken ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
